Description: Our company "Doctor Guard pest control" is looking for a supervisor of pest control with good work experience.Skills
Skills: We are looking for an experienced pest control engineer/supervisor approved by Dubai Municipality. job description:

• Determine the type of treatment necessary for the destruction of a particular type of pest, and consult technical specialists and customers about the type of treatment necessary for the destruction of identified pests.
• Inspect the clients' premises to determine the necessary dimensions of the area in need of pest control.
• Fill out all necessary paperwork according to customer requirements.
• Ensure that technical personnel use suitable pesticides by following the instructions on the label and following safety procedures.
• Respond to customer requests for various pest control services.
• The identity card of the head of the Dubai Municipality is mandatory
• Bachelor's degree in Agriculture / Zoology / Entomology
• Certified Supervisor/engineer with proven experience as a supervisor/pest control engineer or a similar position.
• The ability to stand for a long period of time when working in uncomfortable conditions.
• Understand and manage all equipment and chemicals.
• Knowledge of pest and termite control measures is of paramount importance.
• Candidates should have knowledge of the preparation of reports on the work done. Must have good customer service skills and be customer-oriented.
• Good communication skills in English - read, speak and write.
